A V/Q scan was completed but not yet read. The patient's 2D echocardiogram showed no evidence of pulmonary edema or other cardiac abnormalities.

The patient's gastroparesis has improved with supportive measures, and her acute renal failure has resolved. She has been started on tube feeds again and her diabetes type 1 is being managed with insulin.
